page.title: 06Typical School Day
page.content:
Every morning I rise at half seven.A school mini bus takes me to school.I'm at school at 8.50.A teacher takes the bell out and rings it.The teacher tells us to do mental maths from 9.05 to 9.25,then we have a television programme from 9.25 to 9.50 called "Picture Box".At the end of Picture Box we write a story from 9.50 to 10.35.After break,Science from 10.50 to 11.30.After that we have toget our maths mechanical books to do maths from 11.30 to 12.15.Every one gets to play from 12.15 to 1.00.From 1.00 to 2.00 we get English comprehension.
.From 2.00 to 3.00 we change class,for Geography.At 3.00 school ends but some pupils stay behind for football,gymnastics or computer club.
